title: Tablet PvP :o

replies.body: How are you playing on a tablet? :o
replies.body_tagged: How are you playing on a tablet? :o

replies.body:
I'm a god o3o

Graphics tablet. Although difficult, it's possible to use. Only problem is, I haven't found out how to scroll, so I'd have to learn how to hotkey x3

replies.body: can i buy this tablet
replies.body_tagged: can i buy this tablet

replies.body: How did you get it to work? I tried my Wacom tablet, and all it did was start spinning randomly whenever I clicked.
replies.body_tagged: How did you get it to work? I tried my Wacom tablet, and all it did was start spinning randomly whenever I clicked.

replies.body:
You can connect ur tablet to ur computer, that might work guys.

But don't trust me on that
replies.body_tagged:
You can connect ur tablet to ur computer, that might work guys.

But don't trust me on that

replies.body:
I have an Intuos tablet. Small one. At first I just spun a lot, as you could tell by the video, but then I got used to it. x3 I can't control it though, and I don't plan on fully learning how to for a little while.

Just takes practice. In osu, it took me less than an hour to get used to the tablet, while it takes other people a lot longer. Time depends.
